price: 4. Hij (Mohammed) zei: “Mijn Heer kent (ieder gesproken) woord in de hemelen en de aarde. En Hij is Alhorend, de Alwetende.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّي يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡقَوۡلَ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbī yaʿlamu al-qawla fī al-samāi wal-arḍi wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
